high_descs: Turn to the left and walk to the sofa.
Pick up the newspaper from the sofa.
Walk to the floor lamp that is to the left of the sofa.
anns.task_desc: Examine a newspaper by the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Move to the right side of the large tan sofa
Pick up the newspaper on top of the sofa
Carry the newspaper to the left side of the sofa where the lamp is
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while carrying a newspaper

high_descs: turn to the left twice and take a few steps forward and turn to the right and go to the sofa
pick up the newspaper from the sofa
turn to the right and go to the blue chair and turn to the right
anns.task_desc: Examine a newspaper by the light of a floor lamp
